lyrics.stanza: The heavenly vision Concerning the function Of God's chosen people on earth today Controls and directs us, Restricts and perfects us To minister Christ and close this age!
Reigning in life: Being ruled by the Spirit, Restricted and limited; Reigning in life: To bring in God's kingdom And realize the kingdom life.
A time of confinement To seek the experience In being alone with our Lord today And speak forth with boldness The dreams of our father, Discipling the nations to close this age!
